content.text:
Winter in the mountains

The excitement of sun, snow and skiing fun, there is nothing quite like a ski holiday in the mountains to clear your mind and get you fired up. After a busy day out on the slopes, it’s great to come in from the cold to a lovely, warm, cosy apartment or chalet. After a hard day eating up pistes of all colours, it’s time for the après-ski: Gather round the table to share a fondue or raclette with family and friends, warm up in front of a crackling log fire or in the sauna, finish the evening off in good company with a steaming mug of hot chocolate or maybe something stronger. Good times make great memories, make great ski holidays!

Wherever you want to go skiing, check out our value-for-money ski apartments in France and Switzerland, or trade up to have your own ski chalet for a week in Switzerland or Austria; and it won’t cost as much as you think; Skiing self-catered is a great way to budget, while maintaining absolute freedom to enjoy your ski holiday just the way you want to... Your schedule, your fun, your holiday.

Ideas for your winter holidays

Get inspired by our most attractive and popular ski chalets and apartments. How about a place that’s close to the slopes for this winter? Whether you’re looking for a cosy chalet for the whole family or a charming apartment for two, with our broad selection you will certainly find what you are looking for.

Our top 6 destinations: Zermatt, Grindelwald, Nendaz, St. Moritz, Davos, Crans Montana.

Dream destinations for your winter holidays

Spend your winter holidays in the most gorgeous winter regions in Austria, Switzerland, France, Italy or Germany. Discover breathtaking mountain views, popular skiing regions and picturesque winter worlds or enjoy a cosy 'kota' in Skandinavia and the polarlights of Lapland. Wherever you want to go: our selection has your personal dream winter home in Europe´s most beautiful winter regions.
